document_data.name: Detect Living
document_data.mainbody: '''''Detect living''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[necromancy]] and [[divination]] [[spell]] used by specialty priests devoted to [[Jergal]] called [[Doomscribe]]s.
document_data.Effects:
This spell revealed the location of living things within a {{SI|60|ft}} sphere to the caster by marking them with an aura visible only to the caster. More intelligent creatures glowed with a brighter aura. The spell would mark targets that were even hidden by magical means.

The [[Scriveners of Doom]] developed this spell as a defense against ambush as well as to locate mortals attempting to flee from eternal rest.
document_data.Components: This spell required only  [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s to cast.
